The Eternals is a brand new online car rental company established on the mid-term of 2019. The business was started by four person-a,b,c,d. Our journey began when one of our founder Marcus encounter an issue about the inconvenience of renting a car in kuching. An issue has caught his attention and ignite the idea for him to start this business.
